snippet.title: Aversion: Sunrise May Trailer
snippet.description:
Aversion: Sunrise is a single player tactical turn-based strategy game with strong RPG elements, set in a grim science-fiction setting for PC. 
Sign up for our newsletter at: http://palindromeinteractive.com/Aversion/aversion.html

Check it out on Facebook: 
https://www.facebook.com/aversionsunrise/
Follow us on Twitter: 
https://twitter.com/Palindrome_int
